subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Ricketts family, which bought the Cubs in 2009 and promised a winner, has faced all sorts of bedevilments on the field and off. And then there are the neighbors across the street.
snippet: The Ricketts family, which bought the Cubs in 2009 and promised a winner, has faced all sorts of bedevilments on the field and off. And then there are the neighbors across the street.
